actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title IV-D of the Social Security Act to authorize use of internal revenue service to collect child support for non-AFDC families.

summary.text: Amends part D (Child Support and Establishment of Paternity) of title IV of the Social Security Act to permit a State to use the Internal Revenue Service to collect child support in cases in which a State under part D is required to provide child support collection services to an individual not otherwise eligible for such services.

titles.title: A bill to amend title IV-D of the Social Security Act to authorize use of internal revenue service to collect child support for non-AFDC families.
